title: Objects of Worship
description: Introducing twelve strange, eerie, sensual stories by a bold new voice in weird fiction, with illustrations by Rupert Capricious gods rule a world of women. Zombies breed human cattle. The son of a superhero must decide between his heritage and his religion. Young lovers worship a primordial spider god. The apocalyptic rebirth of the god of the elephants. Monstrous chimeras roam through a devastated future Earth. A retired fisherman caught in the middle of a conflict between gods and superheroes. Teenagers struggle to survive a surreal ice age...
author: Claude Lalumi√®re
